summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 regarding the upcoming Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. It contains congratulations to investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force for their work on the Epstein case, indicating ongoing recognition for their efforts years after the main investigations.

persons.name: Det
persons.context: A detective on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked on the Epstein case and is a recipient of the Finest Foundation Award. Mentioned as needing to be copied on RSVPs.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked together on the Epstein case and are being jointly recognized with an award.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: An awards ceremony held at 1 Police Plaza Auditorium to recognize investigators, including those who worked on the Epstein case.

locations: 1 PP Auditorium (1 Police Plaza Auditorium, New York, NY)
keyFacts: Law enforcement personnel who worked on the Epstein case were being formally recognized with awards in November 2021, years after the main events.
The awards were given by the Finest Foundation to members of the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force.
The email chain shows internal coordination and congratulations within the task force regarding the award ceremony.
